Body:
cosmo, trcs, lfc, bmk = set_up
cl = ccl.angular_cl(cosmo, trcs[t1], trcs[t2], lfc['ells'],
    limber_integration_method='spline') * lfc[fl]
el = np.sqrt((bmk[a1b1] * bmk[a2b2] + bmk[a1b2] * bmk[a2b1]) / (2 * lfc[
    'ells'] + 1.0))
assert np.all(np.fabs(cl - bmk[bm]) < 0.2 * el)
pytest.mark.parametrize('t1,t2,bm,a1b1,a1b2,a2b1,a2b2,fl', [('g1', 'g1',
    'dd_11', 'dd_11', 'dd_11', 'dd_11', 'dd_11', 'fl_one'), ('g1', 'g2',
    'dd_12', 'dd_11', 'dd_12', 'dd_12', 'dd_22', 'fl_one'), ('l2', 'l2',
    'll_22', 'll_22', 'll_22', 'll_22', 'll_22', 'fl_ll')])
